title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 04, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 04, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Fastapi
items.content_text:
### Auth

*   [FastAPI Cloud Auth (⭐349)](https://github.com/tokusumi/fastapi-cloudauth) - Simple integration between FastAPI and cloud authentication services (AWS Cognito, Auth0, Firebase Authentication).
items.content_html:
Auth

  • FastAPI Cloud Auth (⭐349) - Simple integration between FastAPI and cloud authentication services (AWS Cognito, Auth0, Firebase Authentication).

items.title: Awesome Remote Job
items.content_text:
### Companies with "remote DNA"

*   [Crosscan](https://crosscan.com/jobs/) - Retail Analytics, IoT (PHP, React, Web, Mobile, Rust)
items.content_html:
Companies with "remote DNA"

  • Crosscan - Retail Analytics, IoT (PHP, React, Web, Mobile, Rust)

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Registries / XML

*   [crux.land](https://crux.land/) - A free registry service meant for hosting small ( < 10kB) single deno scripts.
*   [Deno PKG](https://denopkg.com/) - An easier way to use code from GitHub in your Deno project.
items.content_html:
Registries / XML

  • crux.land - A free registry service meant for hosting small ( < 10kB) single deno scripts.
  • Deno PKG - An easier way to use code from GitHub in your Deno project.

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### Pilot or development stage / Rust

*   [shared-row (⭐18)](https://github.com/d-wasserman/shared-row) - A specification for right-of-way (ROW) for a SharedStreets Reference.
items.content_html:
Pilot or development stage / Rust

  • shared-row (⭐18) - A specification for right-of-way (ROW) for a SharedStreets Reference.

items.title: Awesome Naming
items.content_text:
### Data Structures and Algorithms

*   [Hill climbing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hill_climbing) - Starting somewhere in the hilly "landscape" of solutions you go in the direction of steepest ascent until reaching the top of a hill. You might miss higher hills though.
items.content_html:
Data Structures and Algorithms

  • Hill climbing - Starting somewhere in the hilly "landscape" of solutions you go in the direction of steepest ascent until reaching the top of a hill. You might miss higher hills though.

items.title: Awesome Earth
items.content_text:
### Other Services

*   [Ecotalk](https://www.ecotalk.co.uk) - UK-based mobile network powered by renewable energy. Profits are used to buy land which is then given back to nature.
items.content_html:
Other Services

  • Ecotalk - UK-based mobile network powered by renewable energy. Profits are used to buy land which is then given back to nature.

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### C++

*   [Sogou Workflow (⭐14k)](https://github.com/sogou/workflow) - Enterprise-grade programming engine aimed to satisfy most of the backend development requirements.

### Workflow Orchestration / Scala

*   [Temporal (⭐15k)](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal) - Open source microservices orchestration platform for running mission critical code at any scale.
items.content_html:
C++

  • Sogou Workflow (⭐14k) - Enterprise-grade programming engine aimed to satisfy most of the backend development requirements.

Workflow Orchestration / Scala

  • Temporal (⭐15k) - Open source microservices orchestration platform for running mission critical code at any scale.

items.title: Awesome Decentralized
items.content_text:
### Other

*   [ArcBlock](https://arcblock.io/): ArcBlock is a decentralized developer platform that simplifies the development of DApps, DLT and Blockchains.
items.content_html:
Other

  • ArcBlock: ArcBlock is a decentralized developer platform that simplifies the development of DApps, DLT and Blockchains.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Anime

- API: [Shikimori](https://shikimori.one/api/doc)

  Description: Anime discovery, tracking, forum, rates

  Auth: `OAuth`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Anime

  • API: Shikimori

    Description: Anime discovery, tracking, forum, rates

    Auth: OAuth

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

items.title: Awesome Free Software
items.content_text:
### Software / Other

*   [IP2Trace (⭐24)](https://github.com/ip2location/ip2location-traceroute) - A traceroute tools that displaying geolocation information using IP2Location database. ([MIT (⭐24)](https://github.com/ip2location/ip2location-traceroute/blob/master/LICENSE))
items.content_html:
Software / Other

  • IP2Trace (⭐24) - A traceroute tools that displaying geolocation information using IP2Location database. (MIT (⭐24))

items.title: Awesome Saltstack
items.content_text:
### Tutorials

*   [Salt Guides and Tutorials, by Linode](https://www.linode.com/docs/guides/applications/configuration-management/salt/) - A good collection of Salt guides and tutorials created and managed by Linode.

### Videos

*   [Salt Project on Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/saltprojectoss) - Salt Project's official Twitch channel.

### Community

*   [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/SaltProjectOSS/) - Official Salt Project Facebook account.
items.content_html:
Tutorials

  • Salt Guides and Tutorials, by Linode - A good collection of Salt guides and tutorials created and managed by Linode.

Videos

  • Salt Project on Twitch - Salt Project's official Twitch channel.

Community

  • Facebook - Official Salt Project Facebook account.
